The Times teamed up with The Observer of London for the investigation into Cambridge Analytica, a voter-profiling company bankrolled by conservative investors that worked on the 2016 Trump campaign.
A firm tied to the Trump campaign used private information — including contacts and “likes” — harvested from the Facebook profiles of more than 50 million users without their permission.
